actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require specific statutory authorization for each canal maintenance, repair, or reconstruction project costing $4 million or more to be undertaken by the Secretary of the Army acting through the Chief of Engineers.

summary.text: Requires specific statutory authorization for each canal maintenance, repair, or reconstruction project costing $4,000,000 or more to be undertaken by the Corps of Engineers.

titles.title: A bill to require specific statutory authorization for each canal maintenance, repair, or reconstruction project costing $4 million or more to be undertaken by the Secretary of the Army acting through the Chief of Engineers.
